general.about:
Detail-Oriented QA Engineer.

* Driven to enhance software quality through innovative and scalable approaches to the SDLC.

* Experienced in developing automated test scripts using tools like Selenium, Appium, and Cypress.

* Proficient in integrating CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployment and testing cycles.

* Skilled in collaborating with cross-functional teams using Agile Scrum methodologies to enhance software performance, reliability, and delivery speed.

awards.heading: AI Security Testing from Microsoft
awards.description:
* Deep-dive into basic concepts of AI security

* Three layers of AI architecture learned

* New, AI specific attack techniques has been identified

* Understood the three categories of AI red teaming

* Planned an AI red teaming exercise

* Security controls for AI systems learned

* Real-life examples with when these controls should be used

* Hands-on Experience with the types of attacks these controls mitigate
awards.title: AI Security Testing

workExperience.heading: Operations Customer Expert at Teleperformance
workExperience.description:
* Actively Web-based Blackbox Testing experience, especially with .har files and Network Console.

* Using CI/CD and ITSM tools like ServiceNow to keep the track of the changes/issues/bugs.

* Daily go-to Agile tools like Jira, Confluence and Slack to stay in touch and sustain the team collaboration.

* Advanced Experience on VPS/Shared Hosting setup with using terminal and panels.

* Watching Splunk to usually track the mail route, where it fails, which port causing issue and most importantly what is the status.

* Understanding and solving issues with the DNS, and common protocols like HTTP, SSH, FTP and SMTP.

* Solving the common Encryption and SSL problems with generating CSR for Rekey, applying Force HTTPS with php.ini and .htaccess with port filtering, and converting CRT to PFX format.

* Setup WAF and set rules like URL and input data validation, parameter injection, rate limiting, SQL and Command filters to prevent any attack/unwanted situation.

* Limiting login attempts, implementing recaptcha, GeoIP filtering and IP/User Blacklist to prevent Brute Force Attacks.

* Streamlined live chat support processes by documenting common technical issues, enabling efficient problem resolution and reducing customer response time by 66%.

* Provided technical assistance to customers, enhancing skills in analyzing system logs and identifying root causes of application and server issues.

* Proposed and implemented automation scripts to address frequently encountered customer support scenarios, improving support workflow efficiency.
workExperience.title: Operations Customer Expert

workExperience.heading: Intern at Istanbul Courthouse
workExperience.description:
* Data Center Operations:\
  Managed and monitored servers, storage devices, and infrastructure within a data center environment. Ensured uptime and efficiency while implementing best practices for security and maintenance.

* Network Administration:\
  Set up, configured, and maintained local area networks (LANs) and wireless networks. Provided troubleshooting and optimization to ensure reliable connectivity.

* Computer Hardware Management:\
  Diagnosed and repaired hardware issues, performed upgrades, and ensured optimal performance of desktops, laptops, and peripheral devices.

* Excel Proficiency:\
  Gained expertise in creating and managing complex spreadsheets, including data analysis, reporting, and automation using advanced Excel functions and macros.
workExperience.title: Intern

workExperience.heading: Intern at Atasay, HUQQA
workExperience.description:
* Advanced Excel Expertise:\
  Developed and automated complex spreadsheets for data analysis, forecasting, and visualization. Utilized advanced Excel functions, pivot tables, and macros to enhance reporting efficiency.

* IT-Driven Financial Reporting:\
  Designed and implemented IT solutions to streamline financial reporting processes. Integrated data from multiple systems into centralized dashboards for real-time insights and decision-making.

* Accounting System Support:\
  Provided technical support for accounting software, ensuring seamless integration with IT infrastructure. Conducted troubleshooting and resolved system issues to maintain accurate financial records.

* Data-Driven Insights:\
  Leveraged IT tools to collect, organize, and analyze financial data, providing actionable insights to optimize budgeting, forecasting, and resource allocation.

* Collaborative Solutions:\
  Worked with cross-functional teams to align IT systems with accounting and reporting requirements, improving overall efficiency and compliance.
workExperience.title: Intern

workExperience.heading: Apprentice at Canpolat Bili≈üim Sistemleri
workExperience.description:
* Learned to set up, manage, and optimize wireless network infrastructures.

* Installed and configured routers and access points to ensure seamless connectivity and efficient network performance.

* Provided technical support to promptly and effectively resolve network-related issues.
workExperience.title: Apprentice

volunteering.heading: Practitioner at Test Automation University
volunteering.description: Test Automation University (TAU) is an online platform w by Applitools, a company specializing in AI-powered visual testing and monitoring. TAU offers free, high-quality courses designed to help professionals and beginners to improve their test automation skills.
volunteering.title: Practitioner

volunteering.heading: TEMS Member at IEEE
volunteering.description: Joining IEEE as a Technology and Engineering Management Society Member aligns with my career aspirations in becoming a proficient SDET. I am eager to collaborate with professionals and peers to explore advancements in AI security, software reliability, and innovative approaches to quality engineering.
volunteering.title: TEMS Member

volunteering.heading: Participant at Selenium Live Event
volunteering.description: Contributed to event Selenium Community Live - Episode 2 as participant, David Burns shared his knowledge and information on Browsers, Browser Engines, WebDriver, WebDriver BiDi Standards, Automation and Testing.
volunteering.title: Participant

education.heading: Computer Programming at Bilgi University
education.description: C#, PHP, SQL and Android Studio Experience

education.heading: Web Programming at Sisli Anadolu Teknik

certifications.heading: Practitioner Level from Katalon
certifications.description: Katalon Studio is a comprehensive test automation tool for web, mobile, API, and desktop applications, offering both a codeless interface for non-technical users and scripting capabilities for advanced testers, with support for seamless integration into CI/CD pipelines.
certifications.name: Practitioner Level

certifications.heading: Advanced Playwright from Test Automation University
certifications.description: Playwright is an open source test automation tool created by Microsoft. This certification helped me to deeply understand how Playwright works and i am more confident and i see why testers choose Playwright over Selenium. Like because 10x more faster.
certifications.name: Advanced Playwright

certifications.heading: Java SDET from CYDEO
certifications.description: 7 Months Full hands-on experience on Java Jr-Mid Level to AI-Enhanced Testing with approximately 1000 hours of experience with dozens of instructors who are experts in their fields, most of whom still continue to work in global companies.
certifications.name: Java SDET

certifications.heading: Learn SQL + Security(pen)Testing from Scratch from Udemy
certifications.description: Step by step Tutorial to learn SQL and Web Security testing with real time examples
certifications.name: Learn SQL + Security(pen)Testing from Scratch

certifications.heading: Certified Tester v4.0 from ISTQB
certifications.description: ISTQB¬Æ is the leading global certification scheme in the field of software testing. The ‚ÄúCore‚Äù stream modules are valid for any technology/ methodology/ application domain and build on the Foundation Level.
certifications.name: Certified Tester v4.0

certifications.heading: Software Architecture: Domain-Driven Design from LinkedIN
certifications.description: Domain-driven design (DDD) is an effective architectural approach for agile environments and microservices. In this course, I learned from Allen Holub how to use DDD to develop domain-focused systems. The course covers DDD basics, microservices, bounded contexts, entities, and compares reactive and declarative systems. It also includes how to conduct an event storming session.
certifications.name: Software Architecture: Domain-Driven Design

certifications.heading: Data Protection and Security Awareness from GoDaddy
certifications.description: GoDaddy is leader in the Domain-Hosting and known for collaboration with Sucuri on Website Security and M365 Mail Security Products, New security certification that i added to my envanter with 100% score pass.
certifications.name: Data Protection and Security Awareness

certifications.heading: Global Anti-Harassment and Discrimination from GoDaddy
certifications.description: GoDaddy is leader in the Domain-Hosting and known for collaboration with Sucuri on Website Security and M365 Mail Security Products, New security certification that i added to my envanter with 100% score pass.
certifications.name: Global Anti-Harassment and Discrimination
